thread.title: 8 Dad Style Classics To Steal From Your Father’s Closet (Or Your Own)

author: Jacob Gallagher
title: 8 Dad Style Classics To Steal From Your Father’s Closet (Or Your Own)
text:
“Dad style,” as covered in this widely read WSJ story, is the current menswear trend of dressing like a minivan-driving, Little-League-coaching suburban dad—whether you have kids or not. For spring, high-fashion labels like Balenciaga, Ami and Acne Studios are churning out techy windbreakers, bulbous running shoes and of course, those generously cut washed-out blue jeans that just scream “Dad!” 

In reporting that story, and asking many men for their thoughts on dad style, I started pondering my own father’s clothes. Not the...
